transport.question: I go choo-choo! I ride on a track. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I have a whistle that makes a loud sound.
🚂 Many carriages are connected to me.
🛤️ I only drive on a train track.

transport.question: I have wheels and go vroom! You drive me on the road. What am I?

hints.text: 🛣️ I am used for everyday drives.
⛽ I need fuel to run.
🚘 I can take your family to the playground.

transport.question: I float on the water. I can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I move on water.
⚓ I am big and carry cargo across the seas.
🚣 You can ride on me at the lake.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 I have handles to steer.
🦵 You need to pedal to move me forward.
🚴 I'm good exercise for little legs.

transport.question: I fly in the sky. I take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I have wings.
💺 Many people can sit inside me.
✈️ I take you to see grandma overseas.

transport.question: I am big and yellow, and I take children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have flashing lights when I stop.
🎒 Children usually sit inside me
🏫 My route ends at school.

transport.question: I have a siren and flashing lights. I help people who are sick. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud 'wee-ooh' sound.
🧑‍⚕️ Doctors and nurses sometimes ride in me.
🚑 I take people to hospital in case of emergency

transport.question: I help put out fires. I am red and have a ladder. What am I?

hints.text: 🪜 I often have a very tall ladder.
👨‍🚒 Fire fighters ride in me.
🔥 I use water to stop burning things.

transport.question: I drive fast with a siren and flashing lights, chasing bad guys. What am I?

hints.text: 👮 I help the police.
🚨 I have a siren that can get very loud.
🚓 Criminals do not want to see me behind them!

transport.question: I fly very high into space. Astronauts travel in me. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 I help astronauts explore the universe.
🚀 I need lots of power to get to space.
🌌 I'm used for space travel.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fishies swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I cover most of the Earth!
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🌊 I have waves.

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean, and I have a big tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I'm not a shark, but I live with them.
🐠 I can be many different colors.
🐡 I like to swim in schools.

ocean.question: I have a shell and live in the ocean. I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back!
🥬 I like to eat seaweed.
🐌 I'm not a rabbit, but I can be slow.

ocean.question: I walk sideways on the beach. I have claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I scuttle!
🖐️ I have pincers.
🏖️ You find me in the sand.

ocean.question: I am very big and gray, and I sing songs in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
💦 I blow water out of a hole in my head.
🐟 I am the largest animal on Earth!

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have suckers on my arms.
🎨 I can change color.
💧 I can squirt ink.

ocean.question: I have a pointy nose and I jump out of the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I am very smart!
🗣️ I communicate with clicks and whistles.
🌊 I like to play in the waves.

ocean.question: I am a very small animal that lives in a shell. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I use a shell as my home.
🦀 I'm not a crab, but I borrow their old homes.
🚶 I carry my home with me.

ocean.question: I am a long, flat fish that hides in the sand and can sting you. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I'm not a snake, but I'm long and flat.
🏖️ Be careful when walking in the shallow water!
⚠️ I have a venomous barb.

ocean.question: I am a sea creature that looks like a star. I can grow back my arms if they fall off. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I live under the sea.
✋ I have five arms, sometimes more.
💪 I can regenerate.
